title: T206 Sale +++ New (and some old) raw cards

posts.post_title: T206 Sale +++ New (and some old) raw cards
posts.post_content:
Getting lazy posting here :o and decided to go another route.

Here is my ebay selling link (sg713):

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=141762737141&ssPageName=STRK%3AMESELX%3AIT&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]

Any card listed at 29.92 (+2 s/h) can be had for 27, delivered.

Any card listed at 19.91 (+2 s/h) can be had for 17, delivered.

Any card not falling in those categories, contact me and maybe we can work something out.

* Either straight BIN or Starting Price.
**  Of course, only cards with no bids.

Always open to trade, not only T206 but E90-1, also.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott :rolleyes:

Hey Scott,

It says 0 results when I click on the link.

I went to ebay.com and manually put in the seller ID, and still the same result.

Just posting here, in case others are having issues. Unless it is from my end?
The link worked for me. I just sent you an e-mail, Scott.
Link worked for me too. 233 items listed.
